.. ipython::

  In [1]: import numpy as np

  In [2]: x = np.arange(10)

  In [3]: x**2
  Out[3]: array([ 0,  1,  4,  9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64, 81])

  In [4]: import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

  @savefig plot_simple.png width=4in
  In [5]: plt.plot([1,2,3]);
